About the Author
Glen E. Clarke is an independent trainer, delivering training courses on certification topics such as Cisco ICND1 and ICND2, SharePoint Server, Exchange Server, SQL Server, ASP.NET, and VB.NET. Glen is well known for his programming and network security courses, teaching IT professionals about network defense and computer forensics.
